alert.note: Alert for Orange County Inland; Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning; Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 28 at 12:30PM PST until January 28 at 10:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northeast winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 45 mph. Local gusts to 55 mph below passes. * WHERE...Orange County Inland Areas, San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning, Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills, Riverside County Mountains, San Bernardino County Mountains and San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Orange County Inland; Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning; Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills
